author: FlagsNZ
title: My first Lego set
review:
This little yellow digger was my first Lego set. For a long time, it was my only Lego.

Parts

It is a simple build and I still have all the parts. The red digger arm has needed some gluing but otherwise it is all good.

The build

I would build all sorts of vehicles using the few parts. Cabin forward, wide wheels etc. These big wheels had a unique connector system which has long been dropped from the Lego System.

The completed model

... sits on my shelf next to my more modern sets.

Overall opinion

I am happy that I have this set in its original condition.
